jobDescription: Snap Inc. is a camera company. We believe that reinventing the camera represents our greatest opportunity to improve the way people live and communicate. Our products empower people to express themselves, live in the moment, learn about the world, and have fun together.  Snapchat is the camera used by millions of people every day to Snap with family, watch Stories from friends, see events from around the world, and explore expertly curated content from top publishers. In short, we are a passionate team working hard to build the best platform in the world for communication and storytelling.  We’re looking for a Data Scientist to join Snap Inc! Working closely alongside the Engineering, Product Design, and Product Management teams, you will create inventive, data-based approaches to solving difficult business problems. What you’ll do:Apply your expertise in quantitative analysis, data mining, and machine learning to create and scale insightsCreate and test hypothesesBuild models and machine learning pipelines to understand how Snapchatters interact with ads on SnapchatHelp the Business and Engineering teams make decisions based on dataMinimum qualifications: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field or equivalent experience2+ years of experience in data science or another related technical fieldPreferred qualifications:MS or PhD in statistics or other quantitative field3+ years of experience in machine learningExperience with SparkExperience with causal inference techniques, experimental design and/or A/B testingExperience in ads measurement or ad techAn interest in translating technical results for cross-functional stakeholders across the organizationFluency in SQL or other big data querying languagesExperience with programming languages such as Python or RAbility to communicate analyses in a clear and effective manner to senior-level audiencesAt Snap, we believe that having a team of diverse backgrounds and voices working together will enable us to create innovative products that improve the way people live and communicate.
